mapper.select: select record_hour_dhcp.id,record_hour_dhcp.city_id,record_hour_dhcp.county_id,record_hour_dhcp.probe_id,record_hour_dhcp.port,record_hour_dhcp.task_id,record_hour_dhcp.service_type,record_hour_dhcp.target_id,record_hour_dhcp.target_ip,record_hour_dhcp.record_date,record_hour_dhcp.remark, city.city_name AS city_name, county.county_name AS area_name, probe.probe_name AS probe_name, target.target_name AS target_name, time_format(record_time, '%H') AS record_time, AVG(record_hour_dhcp.delay) AS delay, AVG(record_hour_dhcp.success_rate) AS success_rate, SUM(record_hour_dhcp.fail) AS fail, SUM(record_hour_dhcp.total) AS total FROM record_hour_dhcp LEFT JOIN city ON record_hour_dhcp.city_id = city.city_id LEFT JOIN county ON record_hour_dhcp.county_id = county.county_id INNER JOIN probe ON record_hour_dhcp.probe_id = probe.id LEFT JOIN target ON record_hour_dhcp.target_id = target.id WHERE record_hour_dhcp.record_date BETWEEN #{ava_start} AND #{ava_terminal} AND record_hour_dhcp.port = #{port} AND record_hour_dhcp.probe_id = #{probe_id} GROUP BY record_hour_dhcp.port,record_hour_dhcp.probe_id;

select record_day_dhcp.id,record_day_dhcp.city_id,record_day_dhcp.county_id,record_day_dhcp.probe_id,record_day_dhcp.port,record_day_dhcp.task_id,record_day_dhcp.service_type,record_day_dhcp.target_id,record_day_dhcp.target_ip,record_day_dhcp.record_date,record_day_dhcp.remark, city.city_name AS city_name, county.county_name AS area_name, probe.probe_name AS probe_name, target.target_name AS target_name, time_format(record_time, '%H') AS record_time, AVG(record_day_dhcp.delay) AS delay, AVG(record_day_dhcp.success_rate) AS success_rate, SUM(record_day_dhcp.fail) AS fail, SUM(record_day_dhcp.total) AS total FROM record_day_dhcp LEFT JOIN city ON record_day_dhcp.city_id = city.city_id LEFT JOIN county ON record_day_dhcp.county_id = county.county_id INNER JOIN probe ON record_day_dhcp.probe_id = probe.id LEFT JOIN target ON record_day_dhcp.target_id = target.id WHERE record_day_dhcp.record_date BETWEEN #{ava_start} AND #{ava_terminal} AND record_day_dhcp.port = #{port} AND record_day_dhcp.probe_id = #{probe_id} GROUP BY record_day_dhcp.port,record_day_dhcp.probe_id;
mapper.delete:
delete from record_hour_dhcp where id in
#{id}
